DSI::TVariant::typeIdOf

typeIdOf< T > Struct Template Reference

#include <TVariant.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Types

enum  { value = Private::TypeListAlgos::Find<T, value = Private::TypeListAlgos::Find<T }

Detailed Description

template<typename TypelistT>
template<typename T>
struct DSI::TVariant< TypelistT >::typeIdOf< T >

Retrieve the typeId for the given template argument. This can be used in conjunction with the getTypeId function in order to construct a switch-case statement. Example:

 typedef TVariant<int, double> tMyVariantType;
 tMyVariantType v;

 switch(v.getTypeId())
 {
 case tMyVariantType::typeIdOf<int>::value:
    ...
 case tMyVariantType::typeIdOf<double>::value:
    ...
 case tMyVariantType::unset:
    ...
 default:
    // can never happen
 }
Note:
Using a visitor should be preferred to a switch-case clause.
See also:
staticVisit
